tool_description: Performs buckling analysis for columns considering different end conditions, slenderness ratios, and material properties to determine critical buckling loads and safety factors.

column_length.description: Effective length of column in meters or feet

cross_section_area.description: Cross-sectional area in m² or in²

radius_of_gyration.description: Radius of gyration in mm or inches

elastic_modulus.description: Elastic modulus in GPa or psi

yield_strength.description: Yield strength in MPa or psi

applied_load.description: Applied axial load in kN or lbs

imperfection_factor.description: Initial imperfection factor for real column behavior

error_messages: Invalid column geometry: column_length, cross_section_area, and radius_of_gyration must be positive
Invalid material properties: elastic_modulus and yield_strength must be positive
Unknown end condition: Use one of [pinned_pinned, fixed_free, fixed_pinned, fixed_fixed]
Invalid applied load: applied_load must be positive
Invalid analysis parameters: imperfection_factor must be between 0 and 0.01, safety_factor must be greater than 1
usage: Provide column_length, cross_section_area, radius_of_gyration, elastic_modulus, yield_strength, applied_load, and end_condition. Optionally specify imperfection_factor and safety_factor for refined analysis.

design_adequate.description: Whether column design is adequate for applied load
